about_the_game:
High-Resolution Opening/Ending Theme EP for Corona Blossom.
Includes 2 tracks in both FLAC and WAV formats.

1. Happy! Corona Blossom
Vocal: Haruko Momoi
Lyrics&Music: Haruko Momoi
Arrangement: Toshinori Orikura

2. Be Myself
Vocal: Ayumi.(Astilbe x arendsii)
Lyrics: Ayumi.(Astilbe x arendsii)
Music: Toshinori Orikura


Note:
-You need a device which supports High-Resolution audio in order to properly play back these audio files.


FLAC:96kHz 24bit
WAV:96kHz 24bit, 96kHz 32bit
